title: Baked Nachos with Ranchitas Nacho Cheese
description: Make delicious baked nachos with Ranchitas Nacho Cheese: crispy, full of flavor, and perfect for sharing.
ingredients: 1 bag Zibas Cream & Spices chips, crushed
instructions: Step 1. In a bowl, mix the cream cheese with the cheddar cheese, garlic salt, bacon, scallions, and paprika.
Step 2. Form small balls with the mixture and coat them with the crushed Zibas.
Step 3. Place the balls on a tray and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Step 4. Before serving, place a Taquerito in the center of each ball and serve.
